Entries.AndyStrawberrySeeds: Heya @,^^Here's three bags of strawberry seeds. These ought to help you durin' your first season in the valley. Farmers gotta stick together these days.^^ -Andy %item object 745 3 %%
Entries.GuntherGift: Dear @,^^Enclosed is a portion of the funding we were recently awarded by the Regional Secretary of Artifacts. Thanks to your generous donations, the museum has become a major contributor to ongoing efforts to conserve Ferngill's cultural heritage. I hope these funds provide assistance in your future adventures.^^ -Gunther %item money 70000 70001 %%
Entries.AndyJojaCola: Heya @,^^I got lucky in a raffle and landed myself a lifetime supply of Joja cola! These'll help keep your energy up while you're working on the farm.^^  -Andy %item object 167 50 %%
Entries.AndyAncientSeeds: @,^Found these while I was foraging deep in the forest. Not exactly sure what they are, but I reckon you're better equipped to cultivate them than me. Lemme know what pops up if you get em growing.^^  -Andy %item object 114 5 %%
Entries.SusanIntroduction: Hello, @^^My name is Susan. Lewis told me you're a new farmer in town. I'm trapped on my farm in the mountains so I can't say hi in person! Hopefully the mess Joja made will be cleared out soon, because I'm going a little stir crazy. Can't wait to meet you and see how the farm is shaping up!^^  -Susan
Entries.SusanFertilzer: Hello @!,^^This is some of the best fertilizer I've made. Grow something delicious and share it with me!^^  -Susan %item object 369 20 %%
Entries.SusanMelonSeeds: @!^^My melons are growing like wildfire this year! Here's some extra seeds I got when I popped a number of them in my seedmaker. Don't go trying to compete with me for the melon market though... I'll win!^^  -Susan %item object 479 5 %%
Entries.VictorDewey: Dear @,^^I'm writing to thank you for listening to me in the graveyard. I know conversations like that can be stressful. If Dewey ever returns, I know he'll be just as happy to have you for a friend as I am.^^  Sincerley, Victor
Entries.OliviaWine: Dear @,^^The market went my way and I cashed out some of my shares for a huge windfall! To celebrate, I ordered a case of my favorite wine, and I wanted to share a few bottles with you. Let's have a glass together soon!^^  -Olivia %item object 348 5 %%
Entries.OliviaCellar: Dear @,^^I wanted to thank you for being such a sweetheart and listening to me the other day. I know I can get a little maudlin when I've had a few glasses. Next time we have a drink, I'll tell you about some of the marvelous places I've visited. It's easy to forget there's a world outside of the valley sometimes, but I have plenty of stories to share.^^  All my love, Olivia
Entries.AbigailJunimo: Hi @,^^I'm still processing what we talked about the other day. I've got more questions than answers. I can't believe that I'm not the only one. I know you won't, but please don't mention this to anyone. I think that this secret just has more secrets underneath it, and I'm not sure I'm ready to turn over all the rocks in my life. Let's talk more soon.^^  -Abby
Entries.GusSophia: Hi @,^^Just wanted to drop you a quick line to ask you not to mention what I told you to Sophia. I trust you to be discreet. It's important we're on the same page. Looking forward to seeing you at the saloon soon.^^  -Gus
Entries.HaleyTalk: @,^^Thanks for being kind the other day. I was totally freaking out and you were super patient. I talked to Emily and she's being super helpful and understanding too. I know I can be a  real brat sometimes. We should talk again soon.^^  -Haley
Entries.KentSummit: Hey @,^^Sorry again for getting so worked up the other day. I wanted to let you know I've started talking to a professional about this. Ever since I came back, I never know what'll set me off. It's time I get my life in order.^^  -Kent
Entries.PierreSVERebate: @,^^Thanks to you and the quality produce you've been shipping, my store's business is booming. Along with our regular rebates, I wanted to send you a special bonus. Thanks for being such a good customer and contributor to our small community. It's people like you who keep local businesses alive.^^  -Pierre %item money 5000 5001 %%
Entries.JojaRockslideNotice: To our valued JojaMart customers:^^Please be advised that the landslide blockage near the railroad will be cleared using explosives tomorrow morning. Avoid the area in case of falling rocks. Joja Co. is not responsible for any damage incurred to people or property in the vicinity.^^JojaMart: We Value Your Business
Entries.SVEadvertisement1: Dear resident:^^Our records indicate that you may not have a membership at JojaMart. Did you know that Joja has consistently scored top in the industry for quality and value? A membership may seem like a big investment, but it unlocks so much - it's a real lifechanger! Join today, and become part of the Joja family.^^JojaMart: We Value Your Business
Entries.SVEadvertisement2: Dear resident:^^In our time in STARDEW VALLEY, Joja has made an effort to become a contributing member of the community. But we can't do it without your help! If you choose to shop at Joja competitors such as PIERRE'S GENERAL STORE, you won't have the same assurance of quality and consistency. And without your business, we won't be able to afford to contribute as much as we'd like to local charities. Shop at JojaMart and help keep your community great!^^JojaMart: We Value Your Business
Entries.SVEadvertisement3: Is work stressing you out? Why not take a trip to the Fern Islands? The Islands are a bustling center of commerce, famous for rinr fruit! Even those on a tight budget will find plenty to enjoy! From the sparkling-clean beaches to lush tropical forests, the Fern Islands are a natural oasis that appeals to beachgoers, birdwatchers, and appreciators of nature from all walks of life. Come chase your bliss on the Fern Islands!^^This advertisement paid for by the Fern Islands Bureau of Tourism.
Entries.SVEadvertisement4: Getting sick of watering crops? Upgraded tools still not doing the job? Running a farm is hard work. Consider hiring some farmhands to help! Especially in high-output seasons like the fall, having a few spare folks around can be invaluable for saving time. Plus, you help create jobs for your local community. Check your local bulletin board to see if anyone's looking for work!
Entries.SVEadvertisement5: ON SALE FOR A LIMITED TIME:^^Special yeast starter with nutrients designed to optimize wine fermentation from a quality-controlled yeast ranch. Has produced award-winning wine consistently since the strain was started almost twenty years ago. Inquiries welcome at Sunshine Vineyard.
Entries.SVEadvertisement6: Are you homebrewing beer? Fermenting your own grapes? Sick of your pricy liquids leaking or drying up in low-quality storage? Try hardwood barrels! They don't leak, they naturally repel liquids, and they're almost completely immune to temperature changes, so no more nasty cracks. Craft them yourself, or stop by Grampleton and pick some up from one of our many talented artisans!
Entries.robinKitchenLetter: Dear Farmer @,^^You might need some more space someday! That's where I can help. If you bring me some raw materials and pay a fee, I can expand your house. The first expansion I offer includes a kitchen. With a kitchen, you'll be able to cook any recipes you've learned!^^Anyway, I hope you're starting to feel at home in Stardew Valley!^^   Your local carpenter,^   Robin
Entries.JasThankYouLetter: To Farmer @,^^Aunt Marnie said I needed to write a thank you letter. So... thanks for finding me in the forest and taking me back home. I won't go that far in the forest again.^^  -Jas

Entries.1000012_EverythingAlright: pause 500/speak Penny "Извини, я задумалась...$2"/pause 750/playSound doorClose/warp Pierre 44 57/move Pierre 0 1 2/move Pierre 4 0 0 true/pause 1000/move Penny 0 0 0/move Pierre 0 -8 3 true/move Pierre -2 0 0 true/pause 1000/emote Penny 28/pause 400/emote farmer 60/move Pierre -2 0 0 true/speak Penny "Я проходила мимо дома Дженкинса и ударилась в воспоминания.$2#$b#Это было до того, как ты приехал сюда.^Это было до того, как ты приехала сюда.$3#$b#В доме где живет Дженкинс раньше жила другая семья...$0#$b#У них был сын, которого звали Тимоти. Я обучала его, Джас и Винсента.$3"/pause 1000/move Penny 0 0 3/pause 1000/move Penny 0 0 2/pause 350/animate Penny false true 999999 23/pause 2000/emote farmer 60/pause 1500/speak Penny "Прогуляешься со мной до моста, @?$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "(Прогуляться ли мне до моста с Пенни?)#Конечно, Пенни.#На самом деле, мне нужно идти."/fork 1000012_WalkBridge/pause 500/speak Penny "...$2"/friendship Penny -250/end position 41 59
Entries.1000012_WalkBridge: pause 500/speak Penny "Спасибо, @.$2"/pause 500/stopAnimation Penny/pause 500/move Penny 7 0 2 true/pause 1200/move farmer 7 0 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 73 54 2/warp Penny 74 54 2/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Penny 2/positionOffset farmer -5 25/stopMusic/pause 600/viewport 73 54 true/pause 1500/animate Penny false true 999999 23/pause 1200/playMusic echos/pause 1700/speak Penny "Тимоти был хорошим ребенком. Ему нравилось учиться и помогать другим. Он, Джас и Винсент были хорошими друзьями.$2#$b#Однажды, Тимоти опоздал на занятия в библиотеке. Он вел себя... необычно тихо.$2"/pause 1500/speak Penny "Ему всегда нравилось учиться, поэтому я подумала, что его поведение было странным.$2"/pause 1100/emote Penny 28/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 700/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak Penny "...Затем я заметила синяки на его руке... и я... я сразу поняла что случилось.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 28/pause 600/speak Penny "Я не знала что делать... Я продолжала вести занятие ещё несколько часов но в итоге не смогла сдерживаться.$2#$b#Я дала Джас и Винсенту задание и отвела Тимоти в сторону.$2"/pause 1000/speak Penny "Я спросила его про синяки и пообещала, что все, что он скажет, останется между нами.$2#$b#Он начал плакать. Его отец сказал, что Тимоти не должен кому-то говорить о том, что случилось и что это секрет.$2#$b#Если он кому-нибудь скажет, то его отец об этом узнает и Тимоти снова будет плохо.$2"/pause 1000/shake Penny 2000/pause 650/speak Penny "Я хотела тут же пойти в дом Тимоти и убить его отца за то, что он сделал.$5#$b#Но... Я знала что от этого будет больше проблем.$2"/pause 1000/emote Penny 28/pause 700/speak Penny "Я закончила вести урок и повела детей домой.$2#$b#Обычно мы провожали Тимоти первым, так как его дом был ближе всего к библиотеке, но в этот раз мы сначала проводили Винсента и Джас.$2"/pause 1250/speak Penny "После того как Джас и Винсент были дома, я сказала Тимоти, что я хочу помочь ему, и поклялась жизнью что его отец больше не сделает ему плохо.$2"/pause 1500/speak Penny "Я отвела Тимоти в дом мэра и рассказала что произошло. Льюис был ошеломлен. Он вызывал полицию из Зузу и они отправили патруль в дом Тимоти.$2#$b#Полиция забрала его отца и поместили Тимоти под защиту.$2"/pause 2000/stopAnimation Penny/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 650/speak Penny "Скоро их дом выставили на продажу. Я не знаю что случилось с Тимоти, его отцом и мамой, Cindy.$2#$b#Где бы Тимоти сейчас ни был... Я надеюсь он в порядке...$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 1200/speak Penny "Думаешь я поступила правильно, @?$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "(Что мне стоит сказать?)#Ты сделала всё что смогла.#Тебе не следовало вмешиваться в это."/fork 1000012_BetterNow/pause 500/stopMusic/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 250/emote Penny 12/shake Penny 999999999/pause 700/speak Penny "Ты говоришь что было бы лучше стоять в стороне в то время когда невинного ребенка избивает собственный отец?!$5#$b#Ты ТАКОЙ ЖЕ МОНСТР! Не подходи ко мне, @!$5"/emote farmer 28/friendship Penny -1500/end dialogue Penny "Не подходи ко мне.$5#$e#%Пенни игнорирует вас."

Entries.1000018_TalkToMe: pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1800/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 800/speak Jodi "...$2"/pause 1050/pause 1400/speak Jodi "Это всё Кент...$2#$b#Я люблю его и я рада, что он вернулся домой но...$2"/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 650/speak Jodi "С тех пор как он вернулся, он просто... не похож на себя.$2#$b#Он больше не смеется. Не разговаривает со мной. Он практически игнорирует Винсента и Сэма. Он почти не ест. У нас даже не было-$2"/pause 200/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Jodi 12/pause 800/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 650/speak Jodi "Он немного рассказывал мне о тех кошмарах, что с ним произошли. О вещах которые он видел. Друзьях, которых потерял. Через что он прошел, когда его схватили...$2"/pause 400/emote farmer 28/pause 800/speak Jodi "Вчера, Винсент смотрел мультики и случайно нажал на кнопку на телевизоре, после чего картинка замерла.$2#$b#Кент сразу же упал на пол и положил руки на голову...$2#$b#Позже, он рассказал мне, что на их базе, картинка на телевизоре замирала прямо перед тем, как звучала тревога. Так они понимали, что пора прятаться в укрытие.$2"/pause 500/emote Jodi 28/pause 100/speak Jodi "Харви дал мне кое-какие лекарства, которые должны помочь справиться с симптомами ПТСР.$2#$b#Я не уверена, что это как-то помогает.$2"/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 500/textAboveHead Jodi "*шмыг*..."/shake Jodi 1000/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 700/speak Jodi "Мне... *шмыг* мне страшно видеть его таким, и я не знаю как помочь ему, @. Я чувствую себя такой беспомощной...$2"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null#(Джоди плачет...)#$r -1 0 jodi_event1#Кент сейчас нуждается в тебе больше, чем когда-либо. Я думаю ему лучше, когда ты рядом.#$r -1 0 jodi_event2#Тебе стоит поискать врача в Зузу или Пайн-Меза."/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 1500/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 1000/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#Извини, @. Я всегда старалась держать это в себе и возможно рассказала слишком много.$2#$b#Спасибо что выслушал меня.^Спасибо что выслушала меня.$2#$b#Ты, Оливия и Кэролайн - мои близкие друзья и вы всегда рядом и готовы помочь мне.$2."/pause 1500/speak Jodi "Я надеюсь что однажды смогу помочь вам тоже.$0"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null#(Что мне сказатьy?)#$r -1 0 jodi_event3#Если тебе что-нибудь понадобится, я всегда могу помочь.#$r -1 0 jodi_event4#Вместе вы сможете это преодолеть."/pause 1000/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Jodi "Мне уже гораздо лучше, @.$0#$b#Я последую твоему совету.$0"/pause 1250/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 1350/speak Jodi "Я хочу закончить поливать цветы, давай поговорим позже. Спасибо тебе ещё раз.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Jodi "Спасибо за разговор, @. Теперь я знаю, что делать, чтобы помочь Кенту. Я думаю всё вскоре наладится.$0"

Entries.1000013_KeepSecret: pause 700/speak Caroline "Спасибо, @.$0"/pause 600/move Caroline 0 0 2/pause 900/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 750/speak Caroline "Сперва тебе стоит знать, что у нас и Пьера были не самые простые отношения, но я люблю его и всегда буду любить, @.$2#$b#Мы стали встречаться когда были молоды. Вскоре я застала Пьера с другой девушкой в Грэмплтоне.$2#$b#Я была опустошена когда узнала... Я полагала что лучшим ответом на это будет... переспать с кем-нибудь, чтобы отомстить.$2#$b#Этим человеком...$2"/pause 1250/emote Caroline 28/pause 1500/speak Caroline "Этим человеком был Расмодиус...$2"/emote farmer 16/pause 1200/speak Caroline "Пьер и Я сильно поругались и... расстались. Мы снова сошлись через пару месяцев.$2"/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Caroline 28/move farmer 1 0 1/emote farmer 60/pause 1700/speak Caroline "Вскоре после этого я забеременал. Я... Я не знала чей это был ребенок.$2#$b#Я никогда не говорила Пьеру, что я была с другим, поэтому у него не было причин полагать, что Абигейл - не его дочь.$2"/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 1500/speak Caroline "С тех пор, как Абигейл покраслиа свои волосы в фиолетовый несколько лет назад, они никогда не меняли цвета. Я подумала что это очень странно...$2#$b#Теперь моя дочь видит магических существ в лесу и интересуется сражениями с монстрами...$2"/pause 1200/emote Caroline 28/pause 1000/speak Caroline "Есть только одно объяснение. Абигейл - не дочь Пьера. Расмодиус - её отец.$2"/emote farmer 16/pause 1150/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 1500/speak Caroline "Я не разговаривала с Расмодиусом много лет. Наши отношения были очень давно. Он был удивлен увидеть меня на своем пороге.$2#$b#Я рассказала ему о Абигейл и что она - его дочь. Он сказал, что у него было чувство, что один из жителей долины - его ребенок.$2"/pause 1500/move Caroline 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Caroline 28/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Caroline "Я... Я так разрыдалась. Я чувствовала себя ужасно из-за того, что он только сейчас узнал об этом.$2#$b#Он сварил мне какое-то зелье для успокоения и объяснил, кто такие Джунимо и почему она может их видеть.$2#$b#Он успокоил меня и дал пару советов.$2"/pause 1500/speak Caroline "...$2"/pause 2000/speak Caroline "Я все еще не знаю, что сказать Пьеру и должна ли я вообще ему говорить. И ещё Абигейл...$2#$b#Расмодиус сказал мне, что это мне решать.$2#$b#Я рада, что он не требует, чтобы я сказала ей об этом. Я... Я чувствую себя такой виноватой.$2"/pause 2250/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 3000/speak Caroline "Я расскажу своей семье, но не сейчас. Не говори об этом НИКОМУ, @. Пожалуйста...$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "(Что мне скзаать?)#Мне жаль, что тебе приходится проходить через это.#Я расскажу Абигейл и Пьеру - у них есть право знать."/fork 1000013_SwearGranpaGrave/pause 500/move Caroline 0 0 3/shake Caroline 9999999/emote Caroline 12/speak Caroline "!!!$3#$b#Я ДОВЕРЯЛА ТЕБЕ! ТЫ УЖАСНЫЙ ЧЕЛОВЕК!$3"/emote farmer 28/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Caroline -2500/end dialogue Caroline "Ты всё ещё не сказал ничего Пьеру и Абигейл, чего ты ждешь, @?^Ты всё ещё не сказала ничего Пьеру и Абигейл, чего ты ждешь, @?#$3#$e#%Кэролайн игнорирует вас."
Entries.1000013_SwearGranpaGrave: pause 750/speak Caroline "...Спасибо.$2"/pause 1500/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 750/speak Caroline "Я... Я знаю что это всё не должно было тебя касаться. They have better equipment than I have in my room!#$b#Not to mention there's a sauna to relax after a tough workout!$0"/pause 1100/move Alex 1 0 1/pause 1100/move Alex 0 0 2/pause 500/speak Alex "I remember when the entrance to this place was blocked off.$5#$b#Joja was moving some large crates off a train and one of the trucks slammed into the rocks, causing the rockslide.$2#$b#Joja sure did take their time fixing their mistake. Susan was isolated from Pelican Town for months and no one could get to her.$5"/pause 500/move Alex 0 0 1/pause 300/speak Alex "You may have heard a huge blast that almost felt like an earthquake pretty soon after you moved here.$2#$b#That was Joja using dynamite to blow up the rocks...$5"/pause 1000/move Alex 0 0 2/pause 750/move Alex 0 0 1/pause 700/speak Alex "So, what brings you here?"/speak Alex "$q -1 null#(Why did I come up here again?)#$r -1 0 alex_event1#I wanted to use the sauna.#$r -1 0 alex_event2#I wanted to say hi to Susan.#$r -1 0 alex_event3#I'm hiking up to the summit!"/pause 1500/move Alex 0 0 3/pause 1500/emote Alex 28/stopMusic/pause 1300/speak Alex "You know... I didn't always work out every day.$2"/pause 700/playMusic desolate/pause 1000/speak Alex "I told you about how I used to live with my father when I was younger. The living conditions were... harsh.$2"/pause 800/move Alex 0 0 1/pause 650/speak Alex "I used food to cope. At one point, I was eating over 4,000 calories a day. I was considered... obese.$2#$b#I knew what I was doing wasn't healthy. I would keep telling myself 'tomorrow is the day' or 'I'll work on it'. I'd exercise for a few days and just... give up.$5#$b#Days turned into weeks. Weeks turned into months. It was all talk, no action.$2"/pause 1000/speak Alex "Then one day, I finally had enough. I realized my dreams would never come true unless I took control of my own destiny. So I forced myself into a routine.$0#$b#It was really tough at first, but after a while, I started seeing results that made me want to keep pushing myself.$0"/pause 900/speak Alex "I used to not be able to do a single pull up. Now? I can do thirty in a row.$1"/pause 500/speak Alex "You should chase your dreams too, no matter how much work it'll take, or how distant the goal is.#$b#You transformed an overgrown dump into a beautiful farm. That's huge, and I'm jealous of how much you've accomplished.$0"/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 800/speak Alex "Heh, sorry. I tend to rant about things sometimes.$1"/pause 500/question fork0 "(What should I say?)#It was a lot of work. You've acheived a lot too.#You talk about yourself too much."/fork 1000001_Inspiring/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1000/emote Alex 60/pause 500/speak Alex "Oh... Sorry, @. Uh... well, I'll see you around...$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Alex -500/end dialogue Alex "...Sorry about my rant earlier.$2"
Entries.1000001_Inspiring: pause 300/speak Alex "Thanks, @! I appreciate it. You've become a good friend - I knew I could trust you to listen.$1#$b#I'll let you get back to your day. See you around!"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Alex 50/end position 29 57

Entries.1000015/m 60000/w sunny/z winter/z fall/: springtown/-500 -500/farmer 19 39 0 Demetrius 27 29 0 Jodi 22 22 1 Caroline 24 22 3 Penny 47 33 2/skippable/showFrame Penny 18/pause 600/viewport 26 29 true/pause 250/textAboveHead Demetrius "The fountain is stunning today."/move farmer 0 -10 1/move farmer 1 0 1/emote farmer 8/pause 800/move Demetrius 0 0 3/pause 300/textAboveHead Demetrius "Hello!"/pause 1000/move farmer 5 0 1/pause 300/speak Demetrius "Hi, @!$1#$b#The weather is astonishing, wouldn't you say?$0"/pause 800/move Demetrius 0 0 0/pause 1200/speak Demetrius "Did you know this fountain is over twenty years old? It was built using funds raised from property taxes right here in Pelican Town.$0#$b#The fountain is maintained and repaired by a technician from Grampleton.$1"/pause 500/move Demetrius 0 0 3/pause 900/speak Demetrius "Are you making progress cultivating your farm?$1#$b#I haven't visited it since you allowed me to set up my experiment in the cave, which I'm still thankful for!$0"/pause 500/speak Demetrius "$q -1 null#(How is my farm doing?)#$r -1 0 demetrius_event1#Robin constructed buildings on my farm!#$r -1 0 demetrius_event2#I'm looking into crafting sprinklers to automate watering.#$r -1 0 demetrius_event3#I've been focusing on honing my combat skills and fishing."/pause 1100/speak Demetrius "Glad you're doing fine here in Stardew Valley. Something? I don't know.#$r -1 0 demetrius_event6#Where does the name come from?"/pause 800/speak Demetrius "A thousand years ago, a huge meteor shower periodically bombarded this specific area of the Ferngill Republic.$0#$b#Of course, back then, the Republic didn't exist yet.$3#$b#The meteors were so plentiful that their trails looked like fibers stretched across the sky.$0#$b#The meteorites looked like tiny drops on the trails, like morning dew on a spiderweb. So our ancestors called these showers the 'Silk Dew of The Stars'.$0#$b#When the Ferngill Republic was first established 150 years ago, the Admission Union named this valley 'Stardew' in honor of our ancestors.$0"/pause 800/speak Demetrius "Have you ever wondered why your crops are always healthy? Or why they so easily bear high-quality produce?$0#$b#That's because of the meteor shower! The soil in the valley is extremely fertile. It has an abundance of nutrients such as nitrogen, phosphorus and potassium!$1#$b#There's also a high concentration of minerals present in the soil, including zinc, manganese, boron, iron, sulfur, cobalt, copper, magnesium and so on.$0#$b#You can grow just about anything with ease thanks to the fertile soil. That won't happen again.$2#$e#%Demetrius looks sad."

Entries.1000016_MoreAboutHim: pause 650/speak Evelyn "Of course, dear! It would be my pleasure."/pause 1000/emote Evelyn 40/pause 300/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 600/speak Evelyn "Richard was charismatic. He had an exceptional amount of integrity, generosity, empathy, and humility. In many ways, you two are very similar.$1#$b#When Richard first moved to the valley, Pelican Town had just begun to attract residents, and most of the region wasn't developed yet.$0#$b#The land was cheap, so he was able to purchase a large plot of land, that became the farm you inherited.$1"/pause 500/emote Evelyn 40/textAboveHead Caroline "Ohh... same old story."/pause 250/speak Evelyn "Richard never raised any animals. He focused on cultivation. His farm was one of the largest and most bountiful in the Ferngill Republic!$0#$b#When he obtained enough funds, he had a greenhouse constructed on the property.$1#$b#He was overjoyed when it was finally finished. I remember him bringing us handfuls of fresh strawberries and blueberries in the dead of winter.$1#$b#Richard always wanted us to share in his happiness.$0"/pause 700/emote farmer 32/pause 800/speak Evelyn "He met his wife, Amy, here and they had a wonderful child, Jeremy - your father, dear. They were such a lovely family.$1#$b#Richard retired, oh, when he was about sixty, and moved to Pine-Mesa City.$0#$b#He wanted to pass down his farm to your father, but Jeremy had other dreams and wanted to follow his own path.$2#$b#Richard never sold the land. He paid the property taxes every year and kept the deed.$0"/pause 700/textAboveHead Jodi "Kent's been like that too..."/pause 700/speak Evelyn "With no one taking care of the farm, nature eventually reclaimed the land. As you saw when you first arrived, it was completely abandoned.$2"/pause 1000/speak Evelyn "I didn't understand why he held onto the land until you arrived, and then I realized he never stopped thinking about the farm as a piece of his family.$1"/pause 1300/move Evelyn 0 0 0/pause 1200/move Evelyn 0 0 3/pause 1000/speak Evelyn "I'm glad you know more about Richard, dear. I understand you were just a child when he passed away.$0#$b#He was a remarkable person, and I see so much of him in you.$1"/pause 300/emote Evelyn 20/pause 1000/move Evelyn 0 0 0/pause 1200/speak Evelyn "I need to walk over to Pierre's to thank him again for this pumpkin. It's perfect for this haystack.$1"/pause 650/move Evelyn 0 0 3/pause 1000/speak Evelyn "Enjoy the rest of your day, sweetie.$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Evelyn "Your grandpa would truly be proud of your accomplishments.$0#$b#It brings me joy that you've brought his farm back to life after all these years.$1"

Entries.1000017/f George 2000/y 2/t 1200 1400/d: none/-500 -500/farmer 31 21 1 George 37 18 0/pause 500/viewport 35 19 true/pause 250/skippable/textAboveHead George "Yoba... please.."/move farmer 4 0 0/pause 700/emote farmer 8/pause 500/move farmer 0 -3 1/pause 1600/speak George "Hi, @. You caught me in the middle of praying.$0#$b#I don't normally get this close to the altar... but I've had a bad day and I need some guidance.$2"/pause 500/question fork0 "(What should I say?)#(Say nothing)#I'll leave you to your prayers."/fork 1000017_EverythingOkay/pause 500/speak George "...$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue George "*sigh*...I need Yoba's guidance in these times.$2#$e#%George looks sad."
Entries.1000017_EverythingOkay: pause 1000/emote George 28/pause 1400/speak George "...I got bad news from Harvey.$2"/pause 800/move George 0 0 2/pause 500/playMusic echos/pause 500/animate George false true 999999 16/pause 1500/speak George "I've had more pain than usual in the mornings, but I didn't think it was a big deal.$2#$b#Evelyn forced me to visit the clinic a few days ago. Harvey found cysts that are the result of... cancer.$2"/pause 300/emote farmer 60/pause 1200/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 650/speak George "I told Evelyn and Alex. They didn't take the news too well...$2#$b#Evelyn said we'll find the best surgeon in the Ferngill Republic to remove them.$2#$b#Harvey also recommended some specialists in Zuzu City.$2"/pause 1500/speak George "To tell you the truth, I'm scared, @.$2#$b#In times like these, I can only find solace in praying to Yoba.$2"/pause 1000/stopAnimation George/pause 650/move George 0 0 0/pause 1300/speak George "Yoba has helped me before when I asked for it. I'm confident Yoba will lend me the power to get through this.$0"/pause 500/question fork1 "(What should I say?)#You have friends and family here to support you.#Praying won't make it better."/fork 1000017_GetThroughThis/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 600/shake George 1000/emote George 28/pause 500/move George 0 0 3/pause 500/speak George "...Leave.$2#$b#Talking to you will surely not help.$2"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship George -1000/end dialogue George "Don't dictate what I should and shouldn't believe in, @.$0#$b#Especially when I just told you I'm very sick...$2"
Entries.1000017_GetThroughThis: pause 500/speak George "We both know I haven't always been friendly in the past, but kind words mean a lot to me right now.$0"/pause 1000/emote George 28/pause 1000/speak George "I'm going to pray for a little longer.$2#$b#I appreciate you stopping by and talking with me.$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue George "I hate people pitying me, but I have no choice but to lean on friends and family now.$0"

Entries.1000025/f Linus 2500/z winter/z fall/y 3: spring_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 57 32 0 Linus 64 21 2/pause 400/skippable/viewport 63 23 true/pause 400/move farmer 0 -4 0/textAboveHead Linus "Good morning!"/move farmer 0 -5 0/move Linus 0 0 3/move farmer 0 -2 1/pause 600/move farmer 3 0 1/pause 500/speak Linus "It's a pleasure to see you, @.$1#$b#How's your morning?$0"/speak Linus "$q -1 null#(How is my morning?)#$r -1 0 linus_event1#It's going well. How about yourself?#$r -1 0 linus_event2#I got some work done on my farm.#$r -1 0 linus_event3#I slept in and didn't do much."/pause 1500/move Linus 0 0 2/pause 1000/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 750/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 1250/speak Linus "We've been good friends for a long time, @. I'm happy you moved to Stardew Valley.$1#$b#Your farm, along with the others here in the valley, have had a huge impact on our community.$0#$b#It reminds me of the old days when your grandpa was running %farm Farm.$1"/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 500/pause 1000/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 1100/emote Linus 40/pause 1050/speak Linus "I know so much about you, but you don't know much about me.$2#$b#I'm... protective of my past, but since we are such good friends...$2"/pause 750/move Linus 0 0 3/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 1000/speak Linus "I'm open to telling you my story, @.$1"/pause 500/question fork0 "(What should I say?)#I'd love to hear about where you come from.#No thanks. I thought I'd offer you my background because we've been friends for so long.$1"/pause 1000/move Linus 0 0 2/pause 2000/speak Linus "Well, I need to go back to my tent and gut the fish I caught.$0#$b#Goodbye, @.$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end position 62 21
Entries.1000025_HearYourPast: pause 1500/move Linus 0 0 2/pause 1750/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 750/emote Linus 40/pause 900/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 700/speak Linus "I moved into the valley some 30 years ago. I left everything I owned behind to connect with nature.$0#$b#My family was very wealthy. I was an only child. Money was never an issue and my parents gave me everything I ever wanted.$0#$b#I was... in a word, spoiled.$2"/pause 1300/speak Linus "I mostly kept to myself. You could say I was an introvert. I didn't have anyone in my life I would consider a close friend.$0"/pause 800/speak Linus "My parents passed away when I was in my mid-twenties.$2"/pause 400/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 700/speak Linus "I inherited their estate and their money. For a while, I used that money to travel around the world.$0#$b#I met so many wonderful people throughout my travels. I visited almost every major city you can think of, and many smaller places too.$1"/pause 1150/speak Linus "One of those places was Stardew Valley.$1"/pause 1000/speak Linus "There was... a magical feeling in the valley, as if it was calling to me.$0#$b#Of all the places I've been, only this one felt like home. I only expected to spend a week here...$1#$b#That week turned into months.$1#$b#The lush forests, mild weather, the sight of the mountains, the abundance of wild food to forage, the beauty of the shifting seasons...$1"/pause 1000/speak Linus "I knew I wanted to stay in the valley for the rest of my life.$1"/pause 1000/speak Linus "I donated the rest of my inheritance to many different charities and orphanages.$0#$b#If memory serves correctly, I believe it was around 3,000,000G.$1"/pause 400/emote farmer 16/pause 750/move Linus 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Linus "I thought that money would be better suited to people who needed it. The valley gives me everything I need. Money meant nothing to me.$0#$b#I learned how to live off the land, and to appreciate everything the natural world has to offer that we sometimes take for granted.$1"/pause 700/emote Linus 40/pause 350/speak Linus "I know deep down that my parents would be happy too. The money they worked so hard to earn was used to better the lives of thousands of others.$0#$b#And me? I've never been happier in my life.$1"/pause 1000/move Linus 0 0 2/pause 1000/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 500/playMusic spring_day_ambient/pause 2500/speak Linus "People are... quick to judge what they don't understand. Almost everyone thinks I'm a homeless bum.$2#$b#But you didn't assume that, @. You showed me compassion and kindness when we first met.$1"/pause 800/question fork1 "(I know what I should say)#I never would have guessed you came from a rich family."/pause 1000/move Linus 0 0 3/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Linus "You never know who people truly are until you really get to know them.$1"/pause 650/emote farmer 32/pause 350/emote Linus 32/pause 1250/speak Linus "I need to go back to my tent and gut the fish I caught.$0#$b#It'll make for a good meal tonight.$1"/pause 1000/speak Linus "I'm happy we've become good friends over the years.$1#$b#I haven't told anyone about my past before.$0#$b#I trust you'll keep this between us.$1"/pause 1100/speak Linus "Take care, @.$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end position 62 21

Entries.1000032/f Willy 1250/z winter/z spring/z: ocean/-500 -500/farmer 24 35 1 Willy 37 35 2 Lewis 12 39 2 Marnie 13 39 2/skippable/showFrame Willy 25/viewport 37 36 true/pause 400/textAboveHead Willy "How incredible!"/move farmer 9 0 1/pause 800/showFrame Willy 24/pause 250/pause 500/move Willy 0 0 3/pause 350/speak Willy "Ahoy there, @.$0#$b#I just landed a real whopper!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 700/speak Willy "Here, let me show you.$1"/pause 500/faceDirection Willy 2/pause 500/textAboveHead Lewis "I know how you feel, Marnie."/playSound openBox/pause 400/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 350/addObject 36 35 159/playSound fishSlap/pause 400/emote farmer 16/pause 500/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 400/speak Willy "This beauty is called a 'Crimsonfish'!$1#$b#They’re a rare species that’s disappearin’ from these parts, sadly.$0#$b#There’s a notion going around that they’re dying off on account of recent pollution from Joja.$2#$b#Since their factories started cropping up across the Ferngill Republic, Crimsonfish populations have dropped off.$2"/pause 900/removeSprite 36 35/playSound fishSlap/pause 500/faceDirection Willy 2/pause 400/playSound openBox/pause 250/playSound dropItemInWater/pause 200/textAboveHead Marnie "I... I don't know, Lewis."/pause 200/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 500/speak Willy "I was just about to release her.$1#$b#I don't want to put these rare treasures in any more danger than they are already, even though I could make some good coin sellin' her.$2"/pause 1500/speak Willy "Sure am happy I’m able to show her to someone. People don’t always believe my fish stories.$1"/pause 1150/emote Willy 40/pause 600/speak Willy "It's times like these I feel like I should invest in purchasing a camera.$1"/pause 1000/faceDirection Willy 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 600/move Willy -1 0 3/pause 600/speak Willy "So how's the fishin' life been treating ya?$0"/pause 500/speak Willy "$q -1 null#(What should I say?)#$r -1 0 willy_event1#I'll fish every now and again.#$r -1 0 willy_event2#I fish at every opportunity I have.#$r -1 0 willy_event3#I haven't picked up my fishing rod in a while."/pause 1250/faceDirection Willy 2/pause 600/move Lewis 0 0 1/pause 400/textAboveHead Lewis "I love you."/pause 800/move Marnie 0 0 3/pause 300/speak Willy "If you squint, you can just about see the Fern Islands across the ocean on a nice day like this.$0#$b#My family is from those islands. We should take a boat out there sometime!$1#$b#Away from the cities the water is crystal clear, and there are some amazing rare fish that are native to the islands.$1#$b#The ring fruit grown on the islands are also delicious! I've been craving a good ring fruit lately.$1"/pause 400/textAboveHead Marnie "I love you too."/pause 1200/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 1000/speak Willy "I'm going to keep on anglin' and toss this Crimsonfish back so she can go on her way.$0#$b#Have a pleasant day, @.$1"/pause 600/move Willy 1 0 2/pause 600/showFrame Willy 24/pause 300/showFrame Willy 25/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Willy 50/end dialogue Willy "I released her back into the ocean.$1#$b#We all need to do our part to make sure we don't tip the balance of nature.$0"

Entries.1000034/e 100162/j 14: MarlonsTheme/-500 -500/farmer 6 19 0 Marlon 6 13 2/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 7/viewport 6 14 true/skippable/playSound doorClose/pause 800/shake Marlon 600/textAboveHead Marlon "You've proven yourself!"/pause 150/move farmer 0 -4 0/pause 700/showFrame Marlon 1/pause 600/speak Marlon "You've ventured into the mines with utmost courage, @!#$b#We could use someone with your skills. Do you want to join the Adventurer's Guild?"/pause 1000/jump farmer/pause 800/jump farmer/pause 1200/speak Marlon "@...#$b#Do you swear under oath, to protect humanity from monsters, and to do everything in your power to uphold the traditions, values, and ideology of the Adventurer's Guild?"/pause 500/jump farmer/pause 1400/move Marlon 0 1 2/pause 700/speak Marlon "On behalf of Stardew Valley and the Order of the Knights of Pythagoras, I officially accept you as the 23rd Adventurer's Guild member!"/pause 1000/speak Marlon "As a member of the Adventurer's Guild, you will be allowed to purchase rare weapons we commission and discover!#$b#There are also bounties and quests you can access from the notice board behind me!"/pause 700/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 350/emote farmer 8/speak Marlon "Don't mind Gil. He just took some of his meds and he's dozing off. I'll inform him of our new member when he awakens."/pause 700/move farmer 0 0 0/pause 750/speak Marlon "Welcome to the guild, @. I expect great things from you."/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Marlon "How is adventuring? If you need a sharper sword, I can put in a good word with Clint."

Entries.1050034/e 1000034/j 40/y 1: MarlonsTheme/-500 -500/farmer -200 -200 0 Marlon 4 11 2/pause 1000/viewport 6 14 true/skippable/pause 3000/warp farmer 6 19/playSound doorClose/pause 500/textAboveHead Marlon "Ah. You're back."/pause 330/move farmer 0 -5 3/move farmer -2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 1000/speak Marlon "@. I've been meaning to have a conversation with you.#$b#I'm sure you have several questions as to who we are, what we do, and the history of this guild.#$b#If you would please join me in my quarters, I'll explain all of this to you."/pause 500/question fork0 "(What should I say?)#I'd like to hear the history of the guild.#Sounds like a long talk. Entries.1050034_GuildHistory: pause 1000/speak Marlon "Follow me."/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/warp farmer 4 5/warp Marlon 6 5/faceDirection farmer 1/showFrame Marlon 12/pause 250/viewport 7 6 true/pause 1500/speak Marlon "Hmm... where to begin..."/pause 600/emote Marlon 40/pause 200/speak Marlon "I'll start with the history of the guild.#$b#I founded the Adventurer's Guild over 25 years ago, after being recognized by the Order of the Knights of Pythagoras.#$b#This Order you now belong to is made up of over fifty guilds and clans around the world, spanning every continent.#$b#Our mission is to protect humanity from monsters corrupted by ancient dark magic. No one knows when this corruption started, or how it began."/pause 1200/speak Marlon "Some ancient legends speak of a past time when monsters and humans lived in peace. If those times were ever real, they now only exist in stories.#$b#So we, the Order of the Knights of Pythagoras, have sworn an oath to protect humans from those monsters. We are, in a way, monster hunters."/pause 850/speak Marlon "This guild in particular works closely with M. Rasmodius. You may know him as the 'Wizard'.#$b#Every guild has a wizard or witch that supports them. It's paramount our weapons are imbued with magic to pierce the life force of monsters."/pause 400/emote Marlon 40/pause 300/speak Marlon "You may wonder why we use swords instead of conventional weapons.#$b#In order to destroy the life force of a monster, you must pierce the their life force fibers in a slashing movement.#$b#This is the only way to ensure the monster is defeated, or else it will regenerate.#$b#Projectile weapons unfortunately don't do the trick. They are able to stun monsters, but they still require a good horizontal slash to finish them off.#$b#If you ever use a projectile weapon, you may understand what I mean, unless you use explosives or magic ammunition with it."/pause 1000/speak Marlon "Alesia was a gifted sniper who used magic-imbued arrows. She used to be a member of this guild before she moved to Castle Village in the desert.#$b#She used her arrows to stun monsters before finishing them with her dagger."/pause 1000/showFrame Marlon 0/pause 800/showFrame Marlon 4/pause 1000/speak Marlon "You may have noticed you're the 23rd adventurer, but there are only a few of us here. We used to have many more members.#$b#Over time, people have left to join other guilds and... and we..."/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 4/pause 650/speak Marlon "We have lost a lot of good people over the years. What we do is dangerous, and it's a thankless job.#$b#Thanks for joining our cause. Your help in protecting the valley is greatly appreciated. I feel as if we're a fully functioning guild again."/pause 800/speak Marlon "$q -1 null#(What should I say?)#$r -1 0 marlon_event2#I'll do everything I can to protect people.#$r -1 0 marlon_event5#It's dangerous and risky. Someone needs to do it."/pause 1000/showFrame Marlon 0/pause 1000/showFrame Marlon 12/pause 500/speak Marlon "I'm proud to hear that from you. You have the potential to be an excellent swordsman."/pause 1250/speak Marlon "We saw each other at the mines of Corneal Mountain. You may be wondering why we don't just seal off the entrance to the mines.#$b#Unfortunately, Joja owns the rights to the mines and won't allow us to seal it.#$b#It's strange. They don't utilize the mines in any way, despite bountiful amounts of ore.#$b#Because of this, we must venture into the mines and slay monsters before they accumulate in mass. I see you have already started!#$b#The furthest floor we have made it to in the mines is floor 93. I would like to see you beat that record."/pause 600/speak Marlon "$q -1 null#(What should I say?)#$r -1 0 marlon_event4#There must be strong monsters deep in the mines...#$r -1 0 marlon_event3#I'll make it past that floor!"/pause 1000/speak Marlon "At some point, we need to go over the types of species of monsters you may encounter, and what their weaknesses are.#$b#And also... that not every monster is corrupted and hostile.#$b#There is a Shadow Person living the sewer. His name is 'Krobus'. Rasmodius and I have been harboring him.#$b#This is to remain a secret. You'll meet Krobus soon enough. I need to see you prove your worth before I introduce you to him."/pause 1200/speak Marlon "I believe that's enough conversation for you today. I'll speak with you again soon on other matters.#$b#I need to check on a new stock of weapons we just received from the new blacksmith in Castle Village."/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Marlon "Remember what I said. Krobus is to remain a secret. There would be dire consequences if anyone got wind of him."

Entries.1004200/w rainy/b 1: rain/-500 -500/farmer 22 37 0 Marlon 22 15 2/pause 1000/skippable/viewport 22 28 true/viewport move 0 -1 4000 true/move Marlon 0 9 2 true/move farmer 0 -11 0 true/pause 5000/speak Marlon "Greetings, @. Entries.alex_event1: Nice! The sauna is relaxing this time of year.$1
Entries.alex_event2: I sometimes run into her when I come to use the gym and sauna. She's always productive and busy.$1
Entries.alex_event3: Awesome! That sounds like a heck of a leg day!$1

Entries.elliott_event2: Ah, I see! I hope your catch is bountiful!$1
Entries.elliott_event3: We've all had those days, @. Spend some time in the sun and perhaps it will bring your mood up.#2
Entries.elliott_event4: Fantastic! It'll surely be a splendid time.$1
Entries.elliott_event5: Not a problem, @! The sea life isn't for everyone. Perhaps later we can spend some quality time together on land.$1

Entries.harvey_event2: Well, you won't be disappointed. They're top quality, made with all organic ingredients.$1

Entries.sam_event1: Yeah, no kidding it is. It's nice to hear we're both in the same boat.$1
Entries.sam_event2: Whoa! Get real. That's crazy! You're lucky you got that arcade machine. That's worth like... 15,000G at least!$8
Entries.sam_event3: Oh... well, that's all right. To each their own, I guess.$2

Entries.shane_event1: I guess I've been standing here for a while just thinking.$3
Entries.shane_event2: Why am I at the railroad? Just thinking...$3
Entries.shane_event3: Heh, nothing gets past you, does it?$3

Entries.abigail_event1: I thought I was the only one who could see them! This is crazy!$7
Entries.abigail_event2: I thought I was the only one who could see them! This is crazy!$7
Entries.abigail_event3: That's... that's a good idea.$2#$b#Sorry, I'm still trying to calm down. Ummm... let me think of a question.$0
Entries.abigail_event4: Umm... I do. let me think... oh, so...$6
Entries.abigail_event5: The Wizard told you? I've never met him...$9
Entries.abigail_event6: I see. Maybe I could look at that book sometime too.$0
Entries.abigail_event7: She is! Apples is very vocal. She's always excited to see me when I visit the forest.$1
Entries.abigail_event8: Umm... about a year ago, I think? I came to the forest to practice a song I was learning, and these little spirits confronted me.$6#$b#At first, I was scared. I thought they were going to hurt me... but Apples was the first Junimo to convey to me that they're peaceful.$0
Entries.abigail_event9: That's funny, you thought they were rats! I saw them as walking apples, which is how Apples got her nickname.$1
Entries.abigail_event10: Oh, that was a long time ago. It makes me wonder if I stumbled across them when I was younger too.$9#$b#Maybe I did... but I can't remember.$2
Entries.abigail_event11: I can't read the language...$2#$b#I've seen it, though.$6#$b#Apples has drawn symbols on the ground and pointed to stone slabs written in it.$0#$b#I knew she was trying to tell me something, but I couldn't understand...$2
Entries.abigail_event12: I did tell my mom and she was... shocked?$2#$b#She told me I have an overactive imagination and that I'm just seeing things. She doesn't take me seriously$9#$b#I also told Sebastian. He laughed at me.$3
Entries.abigail_event13: The Wizard? Interesting... I don't know that much about him.$6#$b#My mom always told me to not talk to him. She even forbids me to go near his tower. I never understood why...$2
Entries.abigail_event14: The Wizard? Interesting... I don't know that much about him.$6#$b#My mom always told me to not talk to him. She even forbids me to go near his tower. I never understood why...$2

Entries.emily_event1: Oh! This is our signature cocktail. Good choice, @!$1
Entries.emily_event2: You must really love your gin, @. The Lunar Horizon is strong!$1
Entries.emily_event3: The Rosette Nebula is one of my favorites! I'm happy you chose this one.$1
Entries.emily_event4: Oh my! The Big Bang has is pretty strong.$6#$b#I'm sure you can handle it, though!$1
Entries.emily_event5: The Red Moon? This is Robin's favorite! Good choice, @.$1

Entries.clint_event1: I look up to you Adventurer Guild members. You keep everyone safe from monsters.$0
Entries.clint_event2: ...Yeah. I knew a couple of them. Fine adventurers with amazing skill.$2
Entries.clint_event3: I've hiked up there myself. Some of those adventurers had quite the kill count on their tombstones. They were fine people.$0

Entries.demetrius_event1: Robin told me she constructed some new buildings on your farm. I hope they're working out for you!$1
Entries.demetrius_event2: That's a smart idea! Automating the process should save you time!$1
Entries.demetrius_event3: I ran into Marlon recently and he told me you're an Adventurer's Guild member.$0#$b#You must show promise as a skilled swordsman!$1
Entries.demetrius_event5: Haha! You tried to guess at least, @.$1

Entries.dwarf_event3: Yes. There is good in your kind.
Entries.dwarf_event4: Perhaps... but it is still used in a way that causes death and destruction.

Entries.evelyn_event1: My day is well. It's a bit on the chilly side, though.$0
Entries.evelyn_event2: Be sure to wear several layers, sweetie! I wouldn't want you catching a cold.$0
Entries.evelyn_event3: That's unfortunate to hear, dear. I'm optimistic your day will brighten up.$0

Entries.gus_event1: She was here a moment ago. She left to run some errands though.$0
Entries.gus_event2: I see! I was just there. Willy is fishing on the dock right now.$1
Entries.gus_event3: Taking in the view of the Gem Sea, of course!$1
Entries.gus_event4: I always make the effort to visit Sophia when I have free time. She really appreciates it.$2
Entries.gus_event5: Hmm... that's why Sophia hates Joja.$2#$b#She... blames them for the death of her parents.$2

Entries.jodi_event1: ...Yes. You're right.$2#$b#I need to be supportive for Kent. We're in this together, and I need to do everything I can to help him.$2
Entries.jodi_event2: Thank you for the idea, @.$2#$b#I'll talk to Harvey about this. I'm sure he'll be happy to refer us to someone.$2

Entries.kent_event4: OUR NATION HAS COMMITTED COUNTLESS ATTROCITIES! WE'VE KILLED THOUSANDS!$3
Entries.kent_event5: OUR NATION HAS COMMITTED COUNTLESS ATTROCITIES! WE'VE KILLED THOUSANDS!$3

Entries.kent_event7: MY PLATOON WAS DECIMATED IN AN AMBUSH! I WAS A COWARD!!!$3

Entries.Jas_event11: I won't wander too far into the forest next time... I promise.$2

Entries.lewis_event1: Good, @!$1#$b#The residents of Pelican Town would truly appreciate it.$0#$b#You can get right to work on the field.$1
Entries.lewis_event2: That's fine, @. My offer still stands if you feel differently at a later time.$0#$b#If you do have a change in mind, you can get right to work on the field.$0

Entries.linus_event1: I'm happy to hear that.$1#$b#I caught some fish this morning. Dinner tonight will be delicious.$0
Entries.linus_event2: Great to hear you're having a productive day.$1#$b#I caught some fish this morning. Dinner tonight will be delicious.$0
Entries.linus_event3: Haha, I see. Those days are certainly the best.$1#$b#I caught some fish this morning. Dinner tonight will be delicious.$0

Entries.marnie_event1: That's great to hear! I also get my seeds from Pierre.$1
Entries.marnie_event2: Aww, that's lovely, @. I'm happy you're treating them well.$1
Entries.marnie_event3: Oh, wow! That sounds like a lot of work, @!$1

Entries.vincent_event1: They do! I sometimes find some myself and sell 'em to Willy.$0#$b#He gives me enough to buy some ice cream or some games of Prairie King at the arcade.$1
Entries.vincent_event2: I like ocean creatures a lot! These tide pools allow me to get a good close look of all sorts of them!$0

Entries.willy_event1: Good to hear you're still enjoying fishing, @.$0#$b#I'm happy I gave you my old  rod to get you started!$1
Entries.willy_event2: That is marvelous to hear, @! I'm happy I gave you my old fishing rod to get you started!$1#$b#I never imagined you’d turn out to be such a skilled angler.$1
Entries.willy_event3: Sorry to hear it, @. Hopefully you'll pick up fishing again soon!$0

Entries.marlon_event4: Yes, there are. The further down you go, the more monsters you'll encounter that have been...#$b#That have been corrupted for many years. It gives them supernatural strength.

Entries.2481135/f Alex 1000/t 900 1600: sweet/-1000 -1000/farmer 44 65 1 Alex 50 68 1/skippable/viewport 53 67 true/pause 3000/speak Alex "That's a good boy, Dusty."/pause 2000/speak Alex "You might be the only one around here who understands me.$s#$b#No one else has seen the kind of stuff you and I have.$s"/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 700/emote Alex 28/playSound leafrustle/move farmer 6 0 2/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 0/jump Alex/pause 800/speak Alex "@! Did you overhear me talking?$7"/move farmer 0 1 2/question fork1 "#Yes, I heard everything.#Not really... why?"/fork didntHear/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 27/pause 600/playMusic desolate/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "I don't really like to talk about it, but I guess I'll explain...$s"/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 0 true/faceDirection Alex 0/pause 500/speak Alex "Have you ever wondered why I live with my grandparents?$s#$b#You see, my father wasn't a good guy... he... well, he ruined everything for me and my mom.$a#$b#Half the time he was gone... the other half he'd drink all night and tell me I'm worthless, that I'd never amount to anything.$a#$b#I think he resented me for being young... bitter because he'd wasted his youth doing nothing and had gotten nowhere in life."/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "Well... that's my take on it, anyway. Who knows what was going on in his mind.$a"/pause 800/speak Alex "One day he left, and soon after that Mom got sick and passed away. I had no choice but to move in with my grandparents.$s"/move farmer 0 1 1/pause 3000/emote Alex 40/faceDirection Alex 0/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Alex "You seem like someone I can trust... that's why I'm telling you this, @. I don't want any sympathy.$s#$b#If there's one good thing about my past, it's that it made me strong."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 3000/speak Alex "I'm going to... think about some things for a bit, @.$2"/pause 1200/speak Alex "I'll catch you later.$0"/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

I got some great footage."
